entry.title: dotnet/announcements - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-08-17
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • .NET Core 2.1 container images will be deleted from Docker Hub #197
    Docker, .NET Core 2.1, EOL, Lifecycle

Updated

  • .NET Core 2.1 container images will be deleted from Docker Hub #197
    Docker, .NET Core 2.1, EOL, Lifecycle

PullRequests

entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-08-17
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Should retain LOOP_ALIGN flag for header that is part of multiple loops #57612
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, untriaged, 7.0.0
  • Segmentation fault #57611
    untriaged
  • [API Proposal]: Add UnicodeRanges.ArabicExtendedB to System.Text.Encodings.Web #57609
    area-System.Text.Encodings.Web, untriaged, api-ready-for-review, 7.0.0
  • [HTTP/3] Server sometimes doesn't receive notification of the end of request stream #57608
    area-System.Net, untriaged
  • Assertion failed 'regArgTab[regArgNum + i].slot == 0' #57606
    bug, arch-arm64, area-CodeGen-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • [QUIC] Developers have QUIC library so they can develop their own protocols on top #57601
    untriaged, User Story, area-System.Net.Quic, 7.0.0
  • [HTTP/3] Developers can build libraries for HTTP/3 to meet their client/server needs (.NET 7) #57600
    area-System.Net.Http, untriaged, User Story, 7.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Reconciling base classes and interfaces in Microsoft.Extensions #57596
    api-suggestion, area-Extensions-Primitives, 7.0.0
  • LLVM AOT doesn't work on MacCatalyst #57589
    untriaged
  • [wasm][eat] System.Diagnostics trimming out DebuggerTypeProxyAttribute. #57588
    arch-wasm, trimming-for-aot, 7.0.0

Closed

  • [wasm] Add descriptive warning when workloads aren't installed #53105
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, 6.0.0
  • Allow SSE/SSE2 intrinsics in R2R and crossgen scenarios #11689
    area-CrossGen/NGEN-coreclr, Future
  • Directory.GetFiles fails when the directory has a file with 255 characters in the name #57578
    area-System.IO, Future
  • Test failure in System.Diagnostics.Process.Tests #57452
    area-System.Diagnostics.Process, blocking-clean-ci, 6.0.0
  • [HTTP/3] Developers can build libraries for HTTP/3 to meet their client/server needs #43546
    area-System.Net.Http, User Story, Priority:0, Cost:XL, Team:Libraries, 6.0.0
  • Breaking change with string.IndexOf(string) from .NET Core 3.0 -> .NET 5.0 #43736
    question, area-System.Globalization, 5.0.x
  • ObservableCounter is not work #57564
    customer assistance, area-System.Diagnostics.Metric

Updated

  • API Proposal: Expose `System.Drawing.Graphics.NativeGraphics`. #39406
    api-approved, area-System.Drawing, 7.0.0
  • atom10itemformattertests.writeto_emptyitem_serializesexpected fails in CI #57375
    area-Serialization, untriaged
  • Test failure: System.Text.Json.Serialization.Tests.ConstructorTests_Stream.PathForChildDictionaryFails #39055
    area-System.Text.Json, blocking-release, needs more info, 6.0.0
  • Feed unreliability affecting CI #55449
    tracking-external-issue, blocking-clean-ci, blocking-official-build, area-Infrastructure, Future
  • system.io.pipelines.tests.flushasynctests.flushasync_throwsifwriterreaderwithexception #55435
    area-System.IO.Pipelines, disabled-test, blocking-clean-ci, 7.0.0
  • Several System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs tests fail with Internal.Cryptography.CryptoThrowHelper+WindowsCryptographicException #31281
    area-System.Security, tracking-external-issue, Future
  • runtime xunit wrapper build failed #45378
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, Future
  • Compiler crashes when failing to release Mutex #53420
    bug, os-linux, area-PAL-coreclr, 6.0.0
  • Host tests often fail on text file busy issues #53587
    blocking-clean-ci, area-Host, 6.0.0
  • bundled_self_contained_nocompression_app_run_succeeds blocking CI #53551
    blocking-clean-ci, area-Host, 6.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Unused functions in InvokeUtil #57615
    area-Interop-coreclr
  • Delete CMake infrastructure for crossgen1 and remove dead code directories #57614
    area-CrossGen/NGEN-coreclr, tenet-build-performance, auto-merge, 7.0.0
  • Remove FOREACH_REGISTER_FILE macro #57613
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Implement NativeLibrary.GetEntryPointModuleHandle #57610
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, new-api-needs-documentation, 7.0.0
  • Experiment only #57607
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Allow folding of `LONG` nodes with field sequences #57605
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Take the memory operand size for some hw intrinsic instructions #57603
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: don't clone loops where init or limit is a cast local #57602
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Make DependencyModel.Dependency readonly and implement IEquatable<> #57599
    area-DependencyModel, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Throw on invalid payload length in WebSockets #57598
    area-System.Net
  • DO NOT MERGE: Using Azure Edge diagnostic endpoint to log reported IP #57595
  • Support reference type custom converters in source gen #57592
    area-System.Text.Json, 6.0.0
  • Missing test for ScopeDisposed in DI tracing event #57591
    area-Extensions-DependencyInjection, community-contribution
  • Update pinned compiler version #57585
    area-Infrastructure, 6.0.0
  • Remove workaroudn for linker issue in Http3RequestStream #57571
    area-System.Net.Http, linkable-framework
  • Fix AddEventLog: EventLogSettings not added #57567
    area-Extensions-Logging, community-contribution
  • [release/5.0] Fix ReadOnlySequence created out of sliced Memory owned by MemoryManager #57562
    area-System.Memory, 5.0.x
  • Validate CompressionLevel value is defined in BrotliStream ctor #57561
    area-System.IO.Compression, breaking-change, needs-breaking-change-doc-created, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Make noise if trying to use the cache after it's been disposed. #57557
    area-System.Runtime.Caching, 7.0.0
  • [wasm] Add support for native relinking after Build, and AOT after publish #57556
    arch-wasm
  • test: add Missing unit tests for Grouping.Any #57550
    * NO MERGE *, area-System.Linq, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • EnvironmentVariables config add missing prefix POSTGRESQLCONNSTR_ #57546
    area-Extensions-Configuration, community-contribution

Merged

  • Some improvements to RF #56659
    area-GC-coreclr
  • [mono] For cross builds targeting s390x use proper objcopy #57566
    area-Build-mono, community-contribution
  • Branding update to 7.0 #57095
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [wasm] Enable tests blocked by IL2105 #57457
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-libraries, trimming-for-aot
  • don't try to test module path if we can't load the module #57590
    area-System.Diagnostics.Process
  • Fix the string search behavior when using ICU #57078
    area-System.Globalization, 6.0.0
  • Fix crashreport for stack overflow #57428
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Add --make-repro-path option to crossgen2 #57543
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • [main] Update dependencies from dotnet/msquic #57581
    area-System.Net.Quic
  • Revert "Change IOptionsSnapshot to reuse options instances across scopes (#56271)" #57570
    area-Extensions-Options
  • Public API document doesn't reflect the actual type. #57485
    area-Extensions-Logging, community-contribution
  • don't dispose client control stream before closing connection #57223
    area-System.Net.Http, 6.0.0
  • Forbid fgMorphCommutative during optValnumCSE_phase #57160
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 6.0.0
  • Add checks for missing SSA numbers #57274
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Remove codesign before bundling #57532
    area-Single-File, auto-merge
  • Remove validation to stat call for symlinks since is a breaking change #57551
    area-System.IO, 6.0.0
  • Fix ARM64 unsigned div by const perf regression #57400
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 6.0.0
  • Number handling with converters #57525
    area-System.Text.Json, 6.0.0
  • Add tests for notification profilers #57429
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, 6.0.0
  • Fix source indexer failing official builds again #57593
  • Make all interpolated string handlers pass by ref #57536
    area-System.Runtime, new-api-needs-documentation, 6.0.0
  • Fix hanging HTTP cancelation test. #57573
    arch-wasm, area-System.Net.Http

Updated

  • Unused functions in InvokeUtil #57615
    area-Interop-coreclr
  • Give tvOS a special value for Personal/MyDocuments #57508
  • Delete CMake infrastructure for crossgen1 and remove dead code directories #57614
    area-CrossGen/NGEN-coreclr, tenet-build-performance, auto-merge, 7.0.0
  • [Group 1] Enable nullable annotations for `Microsoft.Extensions.DependencyModel` #57445
    area-DependencyModel, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Bring XmlReader{Async} to one behavior #51736
    * NO MERGE *, area-System.Xml, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Add `Zero` and `IsZero` properties to `Quaternion`. #57354
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • [WIP] Fix GetGenerationBounds under USE_REGIONS #57101
    area-GC-coreclr
  • GC bookkeeping data structure in-place commit #52402
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Remove FOREACH_REGISTER_FILE macro #57613
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Implement NativeLibrary.GetEntryPointModuleHandle #57610
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, new-api-needs-documentation, 7.0.0
  • Return empty string in InternalAssemblyBuilder.Location #57396
    area-System.Reflection, community-contribution
  • [wasm] Tracking aot failures, not meant to be merged #52004
    * NO MERGE *, arch-wasm
  • Experiment only #57607
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Add AggressiveInlining to Double.CompareTo() and Single.CompareTo() #56501
    area-System.Runtime, tenet-performance, community-contribution
  • Add event to RuntimeEventSource for AppContext switches #57303
    area-Tracing-coreclr
  • Throw on invalid payload length in WebSockets #57598
    area-System.Net
  • Allow folding of `LONG` nodes with field sequences #57605
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • JIT: don't clone loops where init or limit is a cast local #57602
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [libraries] Skip test suites crashing on CI for iOS/tvOS/MacCatalyst #57208
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, os-maccatalyst
  • Take the memory operand size for some hw intrinsic instructions #57603
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [wasm] Add support for native relinking after Build, and AOT after publish #57556
    arch-wasm
  • Some cleanups in Assembly/Loader area #57023
    area-AssemblyLoader-coreclr
  • Make DependencyModel.Dependency readonly and implement IEquatable<> #57599
    area-DependencyModel, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • [Group 4] Enable nullable annotations for `Microsoft.Extensions.Configuration.CommandLine` #57432
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-Extensions-Configuration, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Update pinned compiler version #57585
    area-Infrastructure, 6.0.0

entry.title: dotnet/runtimelab - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-08-17
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • ARM Empty application crashed. #1426
  • ARM Linker issues #1424
  • Compiler complains about scanning issues #1420
    area-NativeAOT

Closed

  • [NativeAOT] System.BadImageException #1421
    area-NativeAOT
  • NullabilityInfoContextTests failing in NativeAOT #1323
    area-NativeAOT

Updated

  • ARM: JIT crash #1397
    area-NativeAOT
  • ARM Empty application crashed. #1426
  • ARM Linker issues #1424
  • Compiler complains about scanning issues #1420
    area-NativeAOT

PullRequests

Created

  • Add required dependencies for ops in scanner on ARM #1423
  • Fix handling of constrained calls on ValueTypes #1422
    area-NativeAOT

Merged

  • Add access violation location in ASM #1427
  • NativeAOT-LLVM: merge past the .net tools change from 5 to 6 #1425

Updated

  • Add required dependencies for ops in scanner on ARM #1423
  • Fix handling of constrained calls on ValueTypes #1422
    area-NativeAOT

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-08-17
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Move from .Net Core 3.1 to .Net 6 missing components? #19802
    Area-External, untriaged
  • Build failed: Validate-DotNet/main real signed, .NET 6, validation-sdk-.NET 6, sdk #sdk-102308-.NET6 #19799
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Ensure <Using /> declarations from in-box SDKs are conditioned on C# #19793
    untriaged, Area-WebSDK
  • The "GenerateBundle" task failed unexpectedly Windows Server 20H2 #19792
    Area-External, untriaged
  • ItFiltersSatelliteResources test fails on Linux #19783
    Area-DotNet Test, untriaged
  • Workload: Add offline cache option to repair command #19775
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • Workloads: Support custom install locations #19774
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • Workloads: Ensure commands are atomic #19773
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • Workloads: Detect and wait for active installs #19770
    untriaged, Area-Workloads

Closed

  • Support --prerelease for dotnet tools #12131
    6.0.1xx
  • Can't install `android` workload with dotnet/installer/main #19789
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • "A self-contained executable cannot be referenced by a non self-contained executable" error on unit tests #17579
    untriaged
  • New `-a` and `--os` are self-contained by default #19706
    Area-NetSDK, 6.0.1xx

Updated

  • Move from .Net Core 3.1 to .Net 6 missing components? #19802
    Area-External, untriaged
  • IncludeNativeLibrariesForSelfExtract includes XML and other files into output binary #19322
    Bug, Area-ILLink, 6.0.1xx
  • Build failed: Validate-DotNet/main real signed, .NET 6, validation-sdk-.NET 6, sdk #sdk-102308-.NET6 #19799
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • BlazorAOT workload installation not working #19798
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • Dotnet CLI does not work properly in VS 22 Terminal? #19251
    needs team triage
  • Ensure <Using /> declarations from in-box SDKs are conditioned on C# #19793
    untriaged, Area-WebSDK
  • Update SDK tests to supported TFM's #16292
    Area-Infrastructure, 6.0.1xx
  • /Users/USERNAME/.dotnet/sdk-advertising-temp/ cannot be accessed #19523
    Area-Workloads, 6.0.1xx
  • ASP: Security policy would not allow process: /Users/<username>/.dotnet/tools/dotnet-ef #19560
    needs team triage, Area-Tools
  • dotnet globally installed tools being killed immediately #19240
    needs team triage

PullRequests

Created

  • Update Versions.props for RC2 #19801
    Branding
  • Update Versions.props for 7.0 branding #19800
    Branding
  • [main] Update dependencies from dotnet/aspnetcore #19797
    Area-External
  • Disable processing in RazorSourceGenerator when no razor files are involved #19791
    Area-AspNetCore
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/5.0.4xx' => 'main' #19787
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Update ValidateExecutableReferences with new schema #19786
    Area-CLI
  • [main] Update dependencies from dotnet/msbuild #19782
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [main] Update dependencies from dotnet/arcade #19781
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [Package Validation] resolve references when running API Compat #19771
    Area-Compatibility

Merged

  • Turn off additional publishing conflicts #19795
    Area-Infrastructure
  • support --prerelease for dotnet tool #19646
  • First pass at upgrading our main hello world tests to target net6.0 #19708
  • [main] Update dependencies from dotnet/roslyn-analyzers #19796
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Rename package to Microsoft.DotNet.Compatibility and fix regressions #19733
    Area-Compatibility
  • [main] Update dependencies from microsoft/vstest #19794
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [main] Update dependencies from dotnet/aspnetcore #19790
    Area-External
  • Update all tests with odd versions of newtonsoft to the 13.0.1 version. #19516
    Area-NetSDK
  • [release/5.0.3xx] Update dependencies from dotnet/arcade #19627
    Area-Infrastructure, Area-CodeFlow
  • [release/5.0.2xx] Update dependencies from dotnet/arcade #19626
    Area-Infrastructure, Area-CodeFlow
  • [main] Update dependencies from microsoft/vstest #19788
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [main] Update dependencies from dotnet/aspnetcore #19777
    Area-External
  • Don't show .NET 6 in VS2019 TargetFramework dropdown #19562
    Area-VS
  • Default to os and arch options to not self contained #19762
  • Update Microsoft.NET.EolTargetFrameworks.targets #19632
  • Update Microsoft.NET.EolTargetFrameworks.targets to add 2.1 #19631
    Servicing-approved
  • Update Microsoft.NET.EolTargetFrameworks.targets to add 2.1 #19630
    Servicing-approved
  • [main] Update dependencies from dotnet/format #19785
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [main] Update dependencies from dotnet/runtime #19778
    Area-DotNet Test
  • [main] Update dependencies from dotnet/fsharp #19780
    Area-FSharp
  • [main] Update dependencies from dotnet/format #19784
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [main] Update dependencies from dotnet/windowsdesktop #19779
  • [main] Update dependencies from dotnet/templating #19776

Updated

  • Update Versions.props for RC2 #19801
    Branding
  • Update Versions.props for 7.0 branding #19800
    Branding
  • [main] Update dependencies from dotnet/aspnetcore #19797
    Area-External
  • [Package Validation] resolve references when running API Compat #19771
    Area-Compatibility
  • Cache results of ResolveTargetingPackAssets across builds #19570
    Area-NetSDK
  • Fix workload update #19703
    Area-Workloads
  • Disable processing in RazorSourceGenerator when no razor files are involved #19791
    Area-AspNetCore
  • Implicit RID support #19725
    Area-External
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/5.0.4xx' => 'main' #19787
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Add self contained short flag #19681
  • Update ValidateExecutableReferences with new schema #19786
    Area-CLI
  • [main] Update dependencies from dotnet/msbuild #19782
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [main] Update dependencies from dotnet/arcade #19781
    Area-Infrastructure

entry.title: dotnet/csharplang - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-08-17
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Interpolated String Handlers: Implicit conversions to strings #5077
    Design Review

Closed

  • [Proposal]: Record Constraints #4453
  • Overload resolution and inferred lambda / method group delegate type: potential breaking change #4674
  • Conditional operator without else #5072

Updated

  • [Proposal]: Static abstract members in interfaces #4436
    Proposal champion, Working Set
  • Interpolated String Handlers: Implicit conversions to strings #5077
    Design Review
  • [Proposal]: Attributes on Main for top level programs #5045
    Proposal, Proposal champion
  • [Proposal]: Explicit lambda return type #4934
    Proposal, Proposal champion, 10.0
  • [API proposal] Attribute for passing caller identity implicitly #4984
    Proposal, Proposal champion
  • [Proposal]: Remove restriction that interpolations within a non-verbatim interpolated string cannot contain new-lines. #4935
    Proposal, Proposal champion
  • [Proposal]: Cancel Async Functions Without Throw #4565
    Proposal
  • [Proposal]: nested members in `with` and object creation #4587
    Proposal, Proposal champion
  • [Proposal]: Raw string literal #4304
    Proposal, Proposal champion, Working Set

PullRequests

Merged

  • Add partial base type nullability differences agenda item #5069

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-08-17
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Investigate purpose of Logger.LogBlock calls #55685
    Area-Analyzers, untriaged
  • Allow access to Compilation that matches a C# Hot Reload #55683
    Area-IDE, Feature Request, Interactive-EnC, untriaged
  • [Coming soon] Require .NET 6 Preview 7 SDK for Roslyn development #55680
    Area-Infrastructure, Concept-Continuous Improvement
  • Invert If refactoring is missing unit tests for Visual Basic #55677
    Area-IDE, Concept-Continuous Improvement, untriaged
  • Store custom evaluation flags on DkmClrValue data items instead of flowing them thru inspection context #55676
    Interactive-Debugging, Backlog
  • Switch case after `or` pattern does not match #55668
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Nullable references checks and params arrays #55666
    Question, Area-Compilers, Area-External, Resolution-Answered, New Language Feature - Nullable Reference Types, untriaged
  • Using property marked with MemberNotNullWhen to a NotNull value doesn't get rid of the warning #55664
    Area-Compilers, Concept-Null Annotations, untriaged
  • Constant, frequent crash VS 16.11 with Source Generator use #55658
    Area-IDE, untriaged

Closed

  • Support analysis scope configuration from Solution Explorer #52768
    Area-Analyzers, Feature Request, 17.0
  • String interpolation refactoring doesn't work on Console.WriteLine #55053
    Area-IDE, 4 - In Review, 17.0
  • [Complete] Require .NET 6 Preview 6 SDK for Roslyn development #55062
    Area-Infrastructure, Concept-Continuous Improvement, 17.0
  • 🥳 🎉 [Complete] Requiring the use of VS 2022 for Roslyn development #54830
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Inline parameter hint is shown for array indexing which isn't really necessary #46614
    help wanted, Area-IDE, Concept-Continuous Improvement, New Feature - Inline Parameter Hints, 17.0
  • `Convert to record struct` should not partially duplicate record's features #54897
    help wanted, Area-IDE, Concept-Continuous Improvement, 17.0
  • CS8604 report possible null reference despite sufficient null checks have been performed with two variables #55678
    Area-Compilers, Resolution-By Design, New Language Feature - Nullable Reference Types, untriaged
  • Regression: SyntaxNode.ReplaceNode throws InvalidCastException #55673
    Area-IDE, untriaged

Updated

  • Allow access to Compilation that matches a C# Hot Reload #55683
    Area-IDE, Feature Request, Interactive-EnC, untriaged
  • Flaky test: TupleWithElementNamedWithDefaultName #52658
    Area-Compilers, Test, Infraswat, 17.0
  • Transient failure in test AsyncIteratorWithCustomCode #34207
    Bug, Area-Compilers, New Feature - Async Streams, 17.0
  • CompletingWithColonInMethodParametersWithNoInstanceToInsert is flaky #49400
    Area-Infrastructure, Test, Backlog
  • Roslyn failing to clean up listeners #48816
    Area-IDE, 4 - In Review, Test, Backlog
  • Assertion failure in CustomAttributesBag`1.get_IsEarlyDecodedWellKnownAttributeDataComputed #49026
    Area-Compilers, Test
  • Flaky test 'InteractiveHostDesktopTests.StackOverflow' #46414
    Area-Interactive, Test, Flaky, Disabled Test, Backlog
  • InteractiveHostCoreTests.Stackoverflow #53392
    Bug, Area-Interactive, Test, Disabled Test
  • Attempt to load System.Runtime reference assembly for execution causes test failure #53391
    Area-IDE, Test, Flaky, 17.0
  • Investigate purpose of Logger.LogBlock calls #55685
    Area-Analyzers, untriaged

PullRequests

Created

  • Remove unused interface #55684
    Area-IDE
  • Allow code actions to apply themselves asynchronously #55682
    Area-IDE
  • Update Arcade and require .NET 6 Preview 7 SDK #55681
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Run dotnet-format on Roslyn #55679
    Area-Compilers
  • Move inheritance margin to its own view margin #55674
    Area-IDE
  • Switch to installing/uninstalling nuget packages in the BG instead of the UI thread #55671
    Area-IDE
  • Merge main to release/dev17.1-preview1 #55670
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Have add-using respect EditorBrowsable attributes. #55669
    Area-IDE, Needs Shiproom Approval
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #55663
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Pass updated types to ManagedHotReloadUpdate #55661
    Area-Interactive
  • testing crash in error reporting #55657
    Area-IDE
  • Prevent exception if their is no else block. #55656
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Update packages version #55655
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Merge main-vs-deps to release/dev17.1-preview1-vs-deps #55654
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge release/dev16.11-vs-deps to release/dev17.0 #55653
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts

Merged

  • ✨ Support a solution-specific analysis scope set through Solution Explorer #52789
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Avoid conflicting values of DkmEvaluationFlags #55675
    Area-Interactive, Next
  • Update codestyle analyzer #55646
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Fix interpolated string refactoring to work for Console.Write* #55521
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Inline Hints: Option added for array indexing #55573
    Area-IDE, New Feature - Inline Parameter Hints, Next
  • Generate minimal canonical records from tuples #55335
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Exclude binaries provided by runtime from vsix #55640
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Merge main to release/dev17.1-preview1 #55662
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Allow OOP features to sync only the subset of projects they need for functioning #55426
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #55660
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Merge main to release/dev17.1-preview1 #55659
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge

Updated

  • Update Arcade and require .NET 6 Preview 7 SDK #55681
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Remove unused interface #55684
    Area-IDE
  • Allow code actions to apply themselves asynchronously #55682
    Area-IDE
  • Use string.Format when an interpolated string part is dynamic #55642
    Area-Compilers
  • testing crash in error reporting #55657
    Area-IDE
  • Add Reference refactoring and imports #55581
    Area-IDE, New Feature - Move Static Members
  • Run dotnet-format on Roslyn #55679
    Area-Compilers
  • Move inheritance margin to its own view margin #55674
    Area-IDE
  • Don't hold onto documents in 'Find' features #55635
    Area-IDE
  • Prevent exception if their is no else block. #55656
    Area-IDE, Community
  • EnC - Tests for lambda improvements #55224
    Area-Interactive
  • Consider MatchPriority when comparing CompletionItems when filter text is lowercase only #55562
    Area-IDE
  • Switch to installing/uninstalling nuget packages in the BG instead of the UI thread #55671
    Area-IDE
  • Update packages version #55655
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Show destination name #55650
    Area-IDE, New Feature - Move Static Members
  • Incremental Generator Work Tracking API Implementation #55469
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Source Generators
  • Change Inheritance Margin Header style #55533
    Area-IDE
  • Treat overload with Delegate parameter as not applicable if lambda delegate type cannot be inferred #55357
    Area-Compilers, 17.0
  • Pass updated types to ManagedHotReloadUpdate #55661
    Area-Interactive
  • Have add-using respect EditorBrowsable attributes. #55669
    Area-IDE, Needs Shiproom Approval
  • Merge main to release/dev17.1-preview1 #55670
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Fix crash for top-level in unused value analyzer #51761
    Area-IDE
  • [main] Update dependencies from dotnet/source-build #55605
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [main] Update dependencies from dotnet/arcade #55436
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Obtain OutputRefFilePath from project system #55244
    Area-IDE

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-08-17
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Update baseline & Clean up baseline suppressions in 7.0 #35431

  • Create 6.0 SiteExtensions package #35430

  • Windows test job failure due to BasicTestApp publish/trimming #35429

  • RazorComponentElement and RazorComponentAttribute classifications unused #35424

  • Missing test coverage in WebApplicationBuilder #35423
    area-web-frameworks
  • Create ConsumesRequestTypeAttribute for Minimal API endpoints #35421
    api-suggestion, 6.0-rc2
  • Using Filters in SignalR to validate resources #35420
    area-signalr
  • [SignalR] IUserIdProvider's GetUserId has no async option #35417
    area-signalr
  • Kestrel Support for Kerberos #35415
    area-security, Discussions

Closed

  • @inject directive completion item is not present when typing is continued #35309
    bug, area-razor.tooling, feature-razor.vs, 17.0-Preview4
  • Part1: Improve error messages for implicit and explicit FromBody attribute in Minimal API #35086
    feature-minimal-actions, area-web-frameworks, 6.0-rc1

  • connection.start() throws exceptions in Angular 11 app #35344
    area-signalr, :heavy_check_mark: Resolution: Answered, Status: Resolved
  • Use the PoolingAsyncValueTaskMethodBuilder to remove state machine allocations for async reads #34645
    Perf, area-runtime, 6.0-rc1
  • Routes added via WebApplication get attached to the last UseRouting call #35281
    feature-minimal-actions, area-web-frameworks, 6.0-rc1
  • Adding routes using UseEndpoints and WebApplication duplicates route data sources added in UseEndpoints #35147
    bug, feature-routing, feature-minimal-hosting, area-web-frameworks, 6.0-rc1
  • Visual studio not terminating node.js processes after ending a debug session of .net apps #34425

Updated

  • LSP platform can flood Razor tooling with semantic token requests. #35396

  • Try out new .NET 6 logging generator #32087
    help wanted, area-runtime, Next sprint planning
  • Blazor WASM apps being blocked by firewalls due to .NET assemblies, even after renaming DLLs #31048
    Working, Docs, area-blazor, blazor-wasm, feature-blazor-boot-up, 6.0-rc1
  • Create 6.0 SiteExtensions package #35430
    area-infrastructure, 6.0-rc2
  • Update baseline & Clean up baseline suppressions in 7.0 #35431
    area-infrastructure, .NET 7-Candidate
  • Blazor AOT .Net6 Preview 7 - Still downloading Dlls #35302
    area-blazor, blazor-wasm, feature-blazor-aot-compilation, Discussions
  • Windows test job failure due to BasicTestApp publish/trimming #35429
    area-blazor
  • Razor colorization issues #34770
    bug, Author: Migration Bot :robot:, area-razor.tooling, 17.0-Preview4
  • Improve Minimal APIs support for request media types & body schema/shape #35082
    area-mvc, api-approved, feature-minimal-actions, area-web-frameworks, 6.0-rc1
  • dotnet-watch: Hot reload will hang indefinitely for blazor wasm if browser does not launch #35427

PullRequests

Created

  • Reset HttpRequestPipeReader error state if reused #35432
    area-runtime
  • Update branding to 7.0.0-alpha1 #35428
    area-infrastructure
  • Update middleware that assumes UseRouting is called after them, for minimal hosting #35426
    area-runtime, area-web-frameworks
  • Add FailureReasons #35425
    area-security

    area-signalr, signalr-client-javascript
  • Fix 'HeadOutlet' getting trimmed away for Blazor WebAssembly prerendered apps after publish #35419
    area-blazor
  • Cancel the token when it's created after an Abort/Disconnect #35418
    area-runtime

    area-mvc
  • E2E test fixes #35414

Merged

    feature-minimal-actions, area-web-frameworks, 6.0-rc1

    area-runtime, 6.0-rc1
  • Add ability to modify UseRouting/UseEndpoint behavior for WebApplicationBuilder #35336
    area-runtime, feature-minimal-hosting, area-web-frameworks, 6.0-rc1
  • [Spa] Try additional hooks to kill the application #34427
    area-runtime, 6.0-rc1
  • Use AbortController polyfill even when global fetch is available #34882
    area-signalr, signalr-client-javascript, community-contribution, pr: pending author input, 6.0-rc1
  • Fix the HttpSys client disconnect race condition #35401
    area-runtime, 6.0-rc1
  • Fixes for internal runtime usage in build and PRs #35133
    area-infrastructure, 6.0-rc1
  • [Static web assets] Removes private reflection from one of our projects by giving it IVT #35408
    6.0-rc1
  • [Blazor] Custom JS initializers #34798
    area-blazor, 6.0-rc1

Updated

entry.content:

Created

Updated

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-08-17
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [Cosmos] Objects sometimes corrupted and mutated in memory on DbContext.Set<T>().Add call #25560
    customer-reported
  • AsSplitQuery sporadically missing navigation properties #25556
    customer-reported
  • Bundle-Migration errors with "cannot access file...being used by another process" #25555
    type-bug, customer-reported, area-migrations
  • dotnet ef dbcontext optimize as a PreBuild task #25553
    customer-reported
  • [Cosmos] How to set a partition key in a embedded entity? #25548
    type-enhancement, customer-reported, area-cosmos, Backlog
  • RevEng: Avoid redundant code in many to many #25547
    type-enhancement, area-test, area-scaffolding, Backlog

Closed

  • RevEng: Error when table selection contains a table name with quotes #25289
    type-bug, closed-fixed, customer-reported, area-scaffolding, 6.0.0
  • Two instances get created with QueryTrackingBehavior = NoTracking #25400
    type-bug, closed-fixed, customer-reported, area-query, 6.0.0
  • How to avoid exeption "Unable to translate collection subquery..." when writing query with group by #24886
    closed-duplicate, customer-reported, area-query
  • Operation on Entities without code dublication #25551
    closed-question, customer-reported
  • Allow TypeMappingSource to use the pre-convention configuration #25084
    type-enhancement, closed-fixed, area-type-mapping, 6.0.0
  • EF Core 5 Grouping subquery under join throws exception #25461
    closed-duplicate, customer-reported
  • 5.0.9 release notes says there are no changes, but there are #25549
    type-bug, closed-fixed, area-docs, customer-reported, 6.0.0

Updated

  • [Cosmos] Objects sometimes corrupted and mutated in memory on DbContext.Set<T>().Add call #25560
    customer-reported
  • Query: Deal with same querycontext parameter having multiple inferred type mapping #19503
    type-bug, needs-design, area-query
  • When using DbContextOptionsBuilder.UseModel with a singleton Instance, EF crashes when trying to initialize the model in multiple threads #25205
    type-bug, closed-fixed, customer-reported, area-model-building, 6.0.0
  • Cosmos: Add translators for member/methods which map to built-in functions #16143
    type-enhancement, good first issue, area-query, area-cosmos, community-contribution, 6.0.0
  • Scaffold tool can create an inverse property with a similar name to a column property and get confused #25292
    type-bug, customer-reported, waiting-for-response, area-scaffolding, 6.0.0
  • InMemory database throwing NullReferenceException when using a nullable value-converted property in a query #25492
    type-bug, customer-reported
  • Exception when creating SQLite DB in when targetting osx-arm64 / .Net 6 (preview) #24198
    type-bug, customer-reported, area-adonet-sqlite, 6.0.0
  • AsSplitQuery sporadically missing navigation properties #25556
    customer-reported
  • Multiple solution file confusion issue #21655
    type-enhancement, customer-reported, area-tools, punted-for-6.0, Backlog
  • Bundle-Migration errors with "cannot access file...being used by another process" #25555
    type-bug, customer-reported, area-migrations

PullRequests

Created

  • Update branding to 7.0.0-alpha1 #25561
  • Make compiled model and runtime initialization thread-safe #25559
  • [release/3.1] Update SQLite dependencies to 2.0.4 #25550
    Servicing-consider, 3.1.x

Merged

  • RevEng: SqlServer: Escape table name passed from user correctly #25558
    auto-merge
  • Query: Run shaper only when needed in SplitQueryingEnumerable #25557
    auto-merge
  • Add scalar type configuration support to compiled models. #25540
    auto-merge
  • Migrations Bundles: Fix some bugs #25554
  • Add translation for DateTime.UtcNow #25545
  • Query: Add a test for group by constant composed #25552
    auto-merge
  • Allow HasDefaultValue where value is assignable to property #25539
  • Register concrete DbContext type in D.I. even when registration for interface is also made #25537
  • Support mapping identity columns to enum properties #25536
  • Make the non-thread-safety of DbContext more visible #25516
  • Log provider version in addition to EF Core version #25515
  • RevEng: Scaffold Many-To-Many join table #25544
  • Query: Add support for GroupBy patterns beyond aggregate #25495
    providers-beware, breaking-change, auto-merge
  • Cosmos FromSql #25525
    auto-merge

Updated

  • Update branding to 7.0.0-alpha1 #25561
  • Make compiled model and runtime initialization thread-safe #25559
  • [release/3.1] Update SQLite dependencies to 2.0.4 #25550
    Servicing-consider, 3.1.x
